com.github.espiandev.navigator

Class PagerNavigationLinker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.espiandev.navigator.PagerNavigationLinker

  • public class PagerNavigationLinker
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which maintains an interface between a ViewPager and a Navigator, and handles interaction between the two.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PagerNavigationLinker(android.support.v4.view.ViewPager viewPager, Navigator navigator) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected java.lang.CharSequence getBackupPageTitle(int position)
      Create a title for a page, if none was supplied by the PagerAdapter.
      void setPagerAdapter(android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter pagerAdapter)
      Set a PagerAdapter on the held ViewPager.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PagerNavigationLinker

        public PagerNavigationLinker(android.support.v4.view.ViewPager viewPager,
                     Navigator navigator)

    • Method Detail

      • setPagerAdapter

        public void setPagerAdapter(android.support.v4.view.PagerAdapter pagerAdapter)
        Set a PagerAdapter on the held ViewPager. You must not call this on the ViewPager instance itself as the Navigator will not be updated.

      • getBackupPageTitle

        protected java.lang.CharSequence getBackupPageTitle(int position)
        Create a title for a page, if none was supplied by the PagerAdapter. The default implementation returns "Page {number}"
